jnxIpSecMonitorMIB.name: jnxIpSecMonitorMIB

revisions.description: Initial version implements only the following tables: - IKE tunnel table - IPSec tunnel table - IPSec security associations table

jnxIpSecMonitorMIB.contactinfo: Juniper Technical Assistance Center Juniper Networks, Inc. 1194 N. Mathilda Avenue Sunnyvale, CA 94089 E-mail: support@juniper.net

JnxIkePeerType.name: JnxIkePeerType
JnxIkePeerType.description: The type of IPsec Phase-1 IKE peer identity. The IKE peer may be identified by one of the ID types defined in IPSEC DOI.

JnxIkeNegoMode.name: JnxIkeNegoMode
JnxIkeNegoMode.description: The IPsec Phase-1 IKE negotiation mode.

JnxIkeHashAlgo.name: JnxIkeHashAlgo
JnxIkeHashAlgo.description: The hash algorithm used in IPsec Phase-1 IKE negotiations.

JnxIkeAuthMethod.name: JnxIkeAuthMethod
JnxIkeAuthMethod.description: The authentication method used in IPsec Phase-1 IKE negotiations.

JnxIkePeerRole.name: JnxIkePeerRole
JnxIkePeerRole.description: Role of the local endpoint in negotiating the IPsec Phase-1 IKE security association. It can be either Initiator or Responder.

JnxIkeNegState.name: JnxIkeNegState
JnxIkeNegState.description: State of the Phase-1 IKE negotiation.

JnxDiffHellmanGrp.name: JnxDiffHellmanGrp
JnxDiffHellmanGrp.description: The Diffie Hellman Group used in negotiations. modp768 -- 768-bit MODP modp1024 -- 1024-bit MODP modp1536 -- 1536-bit MODP modp2048 -- 2048-bit MODP ec-modp256 -- 256-bit EC-MODP ec-modp384 -- 384-bit EC-MODP

JnxKeyType.name: JnxKeyType
JnxKeyType.description: The type of key used by an IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel.

JnxEncapMode.name: JnxEncapMode
JnxEncapMode.description: The encapsulation mode used by an IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel.

JnxEncryptAlgo.name: JnxEncryptAlgo
JnxEncryptAlgo.description: The encryption algorithm used in negotiations.

JnxSpi.name: JnxSpi
JnxSpi.description: The type of the SPI associated with IPsec Phase-2 security associations.

JnxAuthAlgo.name: JnxAuthAlgo
JnxAuthAlgo.description: The authentication algorithm used by a security association of an IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel.

JnxRemotePeerType.name: JnxRemotePeerType
JnxRemotePeerType.description: The type of the remote peer gateway (endpoint). It can be one of the following two types: - static (Remote peer whose IP address is known beforehand) - dynamic (Remote peer whose IP address is not known beforehand)

jnxIpSecMibLevel.name: jnxIpSecMibLevel
jnxIpSecMibLevel.description: The version of the IPsec MIB.

jnxIkeTunnelTable.name: jnxIkeTunnelTable
jnxIkeTunnelTable.description: The IPsec Phase-1 Internet Key Exchange Tunnel Table. There is one entry in this table for each active IPsec Phase-1 IKE Tunnel.

jnxIkeTunnelEntry.name: jnxIkeTunnelEntry
jnxIkeTunnelEntry.description: Each entry contains the attributes associated with an active IPsec Phase-1 IKE Tunnel.

jnxIkeTunIndex.name: jnxIkeTunIndex
jnxIkeTunIndex.description: The index of the IPsec Phase-1 IKE Tunnel Table. The value of the index is a number which begins at one and is incremented with each tunnel that is created. The value of this object will wrap at 2,147,483,647.

jnxIkeTunLocalRole.name: jnxIkeTunLocalRole
jnxIkeTunLocalRole.description: The role of local peer identity. The Role of the local peer can be: 1. initiator. 2. or responder.

jnxIkeTunNegState.name: jnxIkeTunNegState
jnxIkeTunNegState.description: The state of the current negotiation , It can be 1. matured 2. not matured

jnxIkeTunInitiatorCookie.name: jnxIkeTunInitiatorCookie
jnxIkeTunInitiatorCookie.description: Cookie as generated by the peer that initiated the IKE Phase-1 negotiation. This cookie is carried in the ISAKMP header.

jnxIkeTunResponderCookie.name: jnxIkeTunResponderCookie
jnxIkeTunResponderCookie.description: Cookie as generated by the peer responding to the IKE Phase-1 negotiation initiated by the remote peer. This cookie is carried in the ISAKMP header.

jnxIkeTunLocalIdType.name: jnxIkeTunLocalIdType
jnxIkeTunLocalIdType.description: The type of local peer identity. The local peer may be identified by: 1. an IP address, or 2. or a fully qualified domain name string. 3. or a distinguished name string.

jnxIkeTunLocalIdValue.name: jnxIkeTunLocalIdValue
jnxIkeTunLocalIdValue.description: The value of the local peer identity. If the local peer type is an IP Address, then this is the IP Address used to identify the local peer. If the local peer type is id_fqdn, then this is the FQDN of the remote peer. If the local peer type is a id_dn, then this is the distinguished name string of the local peer.

jnxIkeTunLocalGwAddrType.name: jnxIkeTunLocalGwAddrType
jnxIkeTunLocalGwAddrType.description: The IP address type of the local endpoint (gateway) for the IPsec Phase-1 IKE Tunnel.

jnxIkeTunLocalGwAddr.name: jnxIkeTunLocalGwAddr
jnxIkeTunLocalGwAddr.description: The IP address of the local endpoint (gateway) for the IPsec Phase-1 IKE Tunnel.

jnxIkeTunLocalCertName.name: jnxIkeTunLocalCertName
jnxIkeTunLocalCertName.description: Name of the certificate used for authentication of the local tunnel endpoint. This object will have some valid value only if negotiated IKE authentication method is other than pre-saherd key. If the IKE negotiation do not use certificate based authentication method, then the value of this object will be a NULL string.

jnxIkeTunRemoteIdType.name: jnxIkeTunRemoteIdType
jnxIkeTunRemoteIdType.description: The type of remote peer identity. The remote peer may be identified by: 1. an IP address, or 2. or a fully qualified domain name string. 3. or a distinguished name string.

jnxIkeTunRemoteIdValue.name: jnxIkeTunRemoteIdValue
jnxIkeTunRemoteIdValue.description: The value of the remote peer identity. If the remote peer type is an IP Address, then this is the IP Address used to identify the remote peer. If the remote peer type is id_fqdn, then this is the FQDN of the remote peer. If the remote peer type is a id_dn, then this is the distinguished named string of the remote peer.

jnxIkeTunRemoteGwAddrType.name: jnxIkeTunRemoteGwAddrType
jnxIkeTunRemoteGwAddrType.description: The IP address type of the remote gateway (endpoint) for the IPsec Phase-1 IKE Tunnel.

jnxIkeTunRemoteGwAddr.name: jnxIkeTunRemoteGwAddr
jnxIkeTunRemoteGwAddr.description: The IP address of the remote gateway (endpoint) for the IPsec Phase-1 IKE Tunnel.

jnxIkeTunNegoMode.name: jnxIkeTunNegoMode
jnxIkeTunNegoMode.description: The negotiation mode of the IPsec Phase-1 IKE Tunnel.

jnxIkeTunDiffHellmanGrp.name: jnxIkeTunDiffHellmanGrp
jnxIkeTunDiffHellmanGrp.description: The Diffie Hellman Group used in IPsec Phase-1 IKE negotiations.

jnxIkeTunEncryptAlgo.name: jnxIkeTunEncryptAlgo
jnxIkeTunEncryptAlgo.description: The encryption algorithm used in IPsec Phase-1 IKE negotiations.

jnxIkeTunHashAlgo.name: jnxIkeTunHashAlgo
jnxIkeTunHashAlgo.description: The hash algorithm used in IPsec Phase-1 IKE negotiations.

jnxIkeTunAuthMethod.name: jnxIkeTunAuthMethod
jnxIkeTunAuthMethod.description: The authentication method used in IPsec Phase-1 IKE negotiations.

jnxIkeTunLifeTime.name: jnxIkeTunLifeTime
jnxIkeTunLifeTime.description: The negotiated LifeTime of the IPsec Phase-1 IKE Tunnel in seconds.

jnxIkeTunActiveTime.name: jnxIkeTunActiveTime
jnxIkeTunActiveTime.description: The length of time the IPsec Phase-1 IKE tunnel has been active in hundredths of seconds.

jnxIkeTunInOctets.name: jnxIkeTunInOctets
jnxIkeTunInOctets.description: The total number of octets received by this IPsec Phase-1 IKE security association.

jnxIkeTunInPkts.name: jnxIkeTunInPkts
jnxIkeTunInPkts.description: The total number of packets received by this IPsec Phase-1 IKE security association.

jnxIkeTunOutOctets.name: jnxIkeTunOutOctets
jnxIkeTunOutOctets.description: The total number of octets sent by this IPsec Phase-1 IKE security association.

jnxIkeTunOutPkts.name: jnxIkeTunOutPkts
jnxIkeTunOutPkts.description: The total number of packets sent by this IPsec Phase-1 IKE security association.

jnxIpSecTunnelTable.name: jnxIpSecTunnelTable
jnxIpSecTunnelTable.description: The IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel Table. There is one entry in this table for each active IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunnelEntry.name: jnxIpSecTunnelEntry
jnxIpSecTunnelEntry.description: Each entry contains the attributes associated with an active IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunIndex.name: jnxIpSecTunIndex
jnxIpSecTunIndex.description: The index of the IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel Table. The value of the index is a number which begins at one and is incremented with each tunnel that is created. The value of this object will wrap at 2,147,483,647.

jnxIpSecRuleName.name: jnxIpSecRuleName
jnxIpSecRuleName.description: Name of the rule configured in IPSec configuration.

jnxIpSecTermName.name: jnxIpSecTermName
jnxIpSecTermName.description: Name of the term configured under IPSec rule.

jnxIpSecTunLocalGwAddrType.name: jnxIpSecTunLocalGwAddrType
jnxIpSecTunLocalGwAddrType.description: The IP address type of the local gateway (endpoint) for the IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunLocalGwAddr.name: jnxIpSecTunLocalGwAddr
jnxIpSecTunLocalGwAddr.description: The IP address of the local gateway (endpoint) for the IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunRemoteGwAddrType.name: jnxIpSecTunRemoteGwAddrType
jnxIpSecTunRemoteGwAddrType.description: The IP address type of the remote gateway (endpoint) for the IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunRemoteGwAddr.name: jnxIpSecTunRemoteGwAddr
jnxIpSecTunRemoteGwAddr.description: The IP address of the remote gateway (endpoint) for the IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunKeyType.name: jnxIpSecTunKeyType
jnxIpSecTunKeyType.description: The type of key used by the IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel. It can be one of the following two types: - IKE negotiated - Manually installed

jnxIpSecRemotePeerType.name: jnxIpSecRemotePeerType
jnxIpSecRemotePeerType.description: The type of the remote peer gateway (endpoint). It can be one of the following two types: - static (Remote peer whose IP address is known beforehand) - dynamic (Remote peer whose IP address is not known beforehand)

jnxIpSecTunMtu.name: jnxIpSecTunMtu
jnxIpSecTunMtu.description: MTU value of this Phase-2 tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunOutEncryptedBytes.name: jnxIpSecTunOutEncryptedBytes
jnxIpSecTunOutEncryptedBytes.description: Number of bytes encrypted by this Phase-2 tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunOutEncryptedPkts.name: jnxIpSecTunOutEncryptedPkts
jnxIpSecTunOutEncryptedPkts.description: Number of packets encrypted by this Phase-2 tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunInDecryptedBytes.name: jnxIpSecTunInDecryptedBytes
jnxIpSecTunInDecryptedBytes.description: Number of bytes decrypted by this Phase-2 tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunInDecryptedPkts.name: jnxIpSecTunInDecryptedPkts
jnxIpSecTunInDecryptedPkts.description: Number of packets decrypted by this Phase-2 tunnel.

jnxIpsSecTunAHInBytes.name: jnxIpsSecTunAHInBytes
jnxIpsSecTunAHInBytes.description: Number of incoming bytes authenticated using AH by this Phase-2 tunnel.

jnxIpsSecTunAHInPkts.name: jnxIpsSecTunAHInPkts
jnxIpsSecTunAHInPkts.description: Number of incoming packets authenticated using AH by this Phase-2 tunnel.

jnxIpsSecTunAHOutBytes.name: jnxIpsSecTunAHOutBytes
jnxIpsSecTunAHOutBytes.description: Number of outgoing bytes applied AH by this Phase-2 tunnel.

jnxIpsSecTunAHOutPkts.name: jnxIpsSecTunAHOutPkts
jnxIpsSecTunAHOutPkts.description: Number of outgoing packets applied AH by this Phase-2 tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunReplayDropPkts.name: jnxIpSecTunReplayDropPkts
jnxIpSecTunReplayDropPkts.description: Number of packets dropped by this Phase-2 tunnel due to anti replay check failure.

jnxIpSecTunAhAuthFails.name: jnxIpSecTunAhAuthFails
jnxIpSecTunAhAuthFails.description: Number of packets received by this Phase-2 tunnel that failed AH authentication.

jnxIpSecTunEspAuthFails.name: jnxIpSecTunEspAuthFails
jnxIpSecTunEspAuthFails.description: Number of packets received by this Phase-2 tunnel that failed ESP authentication.

jnxIpSecTunDecryptFails.name: jnxIpSecTunDecryptFails
jnxIpSecTunDecryptFails.description: Number of packets received by this Phase-2 tunnel that failed decryption.

jnxIpSecTunBadHeaders.name: jnxIpSecTunBadHeaders
jnxIpSecTunBadHeaders.description: Number of packets received by this Phase-2 tunnel that failed due to bad headers.

jnxIpSecTunBadTrailers.name: jnxIpSecTunBadTrailers
jnxIpSecTunBadTrailers.description: Number of packets received by this Phase-2 tunnel that failed due to bad ESP trailers.

jnxIpSecTunDroppedPkts.name: jnxIpSecTunDroppedPkts
jnxIpSecTunDroppedPkts.description: Total number of dropped packets for this Phase-2 tunnel.

jnxIpSecSaTable.name: jnxIpSecSaTable
jnxIpSecSaTable.description: The IPsec Phase-2 Security Association Table. This table identifies the structure (in terms of component SAs) of each active Phase-2 IPsec tunnel. This table contains an entry for each active and expiring security association and maps each entry in the active Phase-2 tunnel table (ipSecTunTable) into a number of entries in this table. The index of this table reflects the <destination-address, protocol, spi> rule for identifying Security Associations.

jnxIpSecSaEntry.name: jnxIpSecSaEntry
jnxIpSecSaEntry.description: Each entry contains the attributes associated with active and expiring IPsec Phase-2 security associations.

jnxIpSecSaProtocol.name: jnxIpSecSaProtocol
jnxIpSecSaProtocol.description: The index, represents the security protocol (AH, ESP or IPComp) for which this security association was setup.

jnxIpSecSaIndex.name: jnxIpSecSaIndex
jnxIpSecSaIndex.description: The index, in the context of the IPsec tunnel ipSecTunIndex, of the security association represented by this table entry. The value of this index is a number which begins at one and is incremented with each SPI associated with an IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel. The value of this object will wrap at 2,147,483,647.

jnxIpSecSaInSpi.name: jnxIpSecSaInSpi
jnxIpSecSaInSpi.description: The value of the incoming SPI.

jnxIpSecSaOutSpi.name: jnxIpSecSaOutSpi
jnxIpSecSaOutSpi.description: The value of the outgoing SPI.

jnxIpSecSaInAuxSpi.name: jnxIpSecSaInAuxSpi
jnxIpSecSaInAuxSpi.description: The value of the incoming auxiliary SPI. This is valid for AH and ESP bundles.

jnxIpSecSaOutAuxSpi.name: jnxIpSecSaOutAuxSpi
jnxIpSecSaOutAuxSpi.description: The value of the outgoing auxiliary SPI. This is valid for AH and ESP bundles.

jnxIpSecSaType.name: jnxIpSecSaType
jnxIpSecSaType.description: This field represents the type of security associations which can be either manual or dynamic

jnxIpSecSaEncapMode.name: jnxIpSecSaEncapMode
jnxIpSecSaEncapMode.description: The encapsulation mode used by an IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel.

jnxIpSecSaLifeSize.name: jnxIpSecSaLifeSize
jnxIpSecSaLifeSize.description: The negotiated LifeSize of the IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel in kilobytes.

jnxIpSecSaLifeTime.name: jnxIpSecSaLifeTime
jnxIpSecSaLifeTime.description: The negotiated LifeTime of the IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel in seconds.

jnxIpSecSaActiveTime.name: jnxIpSecSaActiveTime
jnxIpSecSaActiveTime.description: The length of time the IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel has been active in seconds.

jnxIpSecSaLifeSizeThreshold.name: jnxIpSecSaLifeSizeThreshold
jnxIpSecSaLifeSizeThreshold.description: The security association LifeSize refresh threshold in kilobytes.

jnxIpSecSaLifeTimeThreshold.name: jnxIpSecSaLifeTimeThreshold
jnxIpSecSaLifeTimeThreshold.description: The security association LifeTime refresh threshold in seconds.

jnxIpSecSaEncryptAlgo.name: jnxIpSecSaEncryptAlgo
jnxIpSecSaEncryptAlgo.description: The Encryption algorithm used to encrypt the packets which can be either es-cbc or 3des-cbc.

jnxIpSecSaAuthAlgo.name: jnxIpSecSaAuthAlgo
jnxIpSecSaAuthAlgo.description: The algorithm used for authentication of packets which can be hmac-md5-96 or hmac-sha1-96

jnxIpSecSaState.name: jnxIpSecSaState
jnxIpSecSaState.description: This column represents the status of the security association represented by this table entry. If the status of the SA is 'active', the SA is ready for active use. The status 'expiring' represents any of the various states that the security association transitions through before being purged.
